content: stormy sky is a lightweight asymmetrical shawl it s dynamic and modern crocheted from the corner in the shape of a skewed triangle it makes a great and fast project for that one very special skein of yarn alternation of sections creates nice texture and is rather easy to memorize tassels can be added to make corners look more polished this pattern can be used as a base for experiments as neither yarn weight nor gauge is critical the number of section repeats can be adjusted as well depending on the desired size of the finished shawl the pattern has step-by-step photos and a video tutorial for the most tricky parts check the page of its popular knitted version 1 for some project inspiration this pattern is offered for free if you feel like saying thank you to the designer and have the means consider buying me a coffee here 2 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/stormy-sky-shawl 2 https //ko-fi com/lifeiscozy
